        public void scored()
        If ball crossed left - or right side increases the opposite players score and starts the countdown for the game to continue after goal

      • isPlayerOneWinner

        public boolean isPlayerOneWinner()
        checks if player one won
        Returns:
        true if player one has 11 or more goals otherwise false

      • isPlayerTwoWinner

        public boolean isPlayerTwoWinner()
        checks if player two won
        Returns:
        true if player two has 11 or more goals otherwise false

      • hasGameEnded

        public boolean hasGameEnded()
        Checks if game ended
        Returns:
        true if one side has scored 11 or more goals otherwise return false.
